original_title: L'aventure de la princesse Sydney: La nuit des citrouilles
overview: Princess Sydney is so lonely… When she hears about the Great Pumpkin Ball, she gets excited – what a wonderful opportunity to make new friends!  But there’s a catch: She has to find a witch to turn her into a pumpkin. Her search takes her to strange and scary places, where she meets a wacky bunch of characters.
title: The Adventures of Princess Sydney: Night of the Pumpkins
